name: Vessel (itch) (Lira Interactive, Gabriel Naves)
description:
This game was designed for mobile 📱, so try the apk if you can! 🙂

Vessel was created by:

- Eber Filipe - Music and Sound Design; (Soundcloud, Spotify)
- Gabriel Naves - Programming and Game Design
- Guilherme Anselmo - Programming and Game Design
- Ícaro Mota - Programming and Game Design
- Mariana Bergo - Artwork and UI Design
